Articles.Content:
What do you think of my flag? (if you didnt notice its my profile pic but stretched).

![9dO6a5u.png](http://i.imgur.com/9dO6a5u.png)

Don't need a separate thread for your flag, add it to the [Flags Megathread like the last one was](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/28293-Show-off-your-flags-MEGATHREAD?p=2119250&viewfull=1#post2119250), please. Locked.
